name: NEFilterControlVerdict
desc: The result from a filter control provider.

items.name: class func allow(withUpdateRules: Bool) -> NEFilterControlVerdict
items.desc: Create a verdict that indicates to the system that all of the flow’s data should be allowed to pass to its final destination, and that the filtering rules have been updated.

items.name: class func drop(withUpdateRules: Bool) -> NEFilterControlVerdict
items.desc: Create a verdict that indicates to the system that all of the flow’s data should be dropped, and that the filtering rules have been updated.

items.name: class func updateRules() -> NEFilterControlVerdict
items.desc: Create a verdict that indicates to the system that the filtering rules have been updated, and that the Filter Data Provider needs to make a decision about the flow’s data.
